    Calculator - Class in Tools
    This class is meant to be used for basic statistical analysis of DataPoint ArrayLists, such as those found in DataSets version 1.0.0

    compareTo(DataPoint) - Method in class DataHolders.DataPoint

    Compares recorded times and dates of two Observations

    Compare's this Date's values to another dates values in chronological order
    compareTo(Time) - Method in class Environment.Time
    Compares this Time to another given Time based on chronological order
    CONVERSION_TYPES - Static variable in class Tools.Conversions.ConversionCompiler
     
    ConversionCompiler - Class in Tools.Conversions
    This class acts as a compiler of all the different unit converters so that they may be easily accessed by the UnitConverter class.
    ConversionCompiler() - Constructor for class Tools.Conversions.ConversionCompiler
     
    ConversionType - Class in Tools.Conversions.ConversionTypes
    This is an abstract class meant to create the backbone for different unit converters and facilitate smooth operation of the UnitConverter class
    ConversionType() - Constructor for class Tools.Conversions.ConversionTypes.ConversionType
     
    conversionTypeList() - Static method in class Tools.UnitConverter

    convert(DataPoint, String) - Method in class Tools.Conversions.ConversionTypes.GeneralConverters.ImperialConverter
    Converts one imperial DataPoint into a new DataPoint with different imperial units
    convert(DataPoint, String) - Method in class Tools.Conversions.ConversionTypes.GeneralConverters.MetricConverter
    Converts one metric DataPoint into a new DataPoint with different metric units
    convert(DataPoint, String) - Method in class Tools.Conversions.ConversionTypes.SingleConverters.ImperialToMetricConverter
    Converts a given DataPoint to its opposite measurement system counterpart
    convert(DataPoint, String, String) - Method in class Tools.Conversions.ConversionTypes.GeneralConverters.MetricConverter
    Converts one metric DataPoint into a new DataPoint with different metric units, then changes the new DataPoint's unit string to match the given measurement type
    convert(DataPoint, String, String) - Static method in class Tools.UnitConverter
    Converts a given DataPoint into another DataPoint with the given units String
    convertMilliseconds(double, double) - Static method in class Environment.Time
    Converts a given number of seconds and milliseconds into a decimal value in seconds

    createMetricUnit(String, String) - Static method in class Tools.Units.MetricUnits
